nodes.text: The colloquially named Hoth hogs were hog-like creatures native to the icy wilderness of Hoth.

Hoth hogs were an herbivorous, land-scavenging race of hog-like creatures. Rarely seen and physically weak, they were among the lowest forms of life in the planet's food chain, serving as prey to animals such as the giant tauntaun. They presumably fed on the fungus and lichens that grew just below the frost layer.
The Hoth hog first appeared as an adversary in the 1993 video game Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.
